output:
Nostalgic Music
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
I said everything I wanted to
Your eyes are crying like the moonshine
Silver tears fall down your face
Please forgive me, I've got to get away
There's a highway ahead of me
It's the light shimmering in the breeze
I keep on driving into the night
Till your memory is out of my mind
Till your memory is out of sight
Tomorrow is another day
I won't look back, it's a drive away
With the sun on my back and the wind in my hair
Tomorrow is another day
